review: Works awesome for Netflix and YouTube.  Streaming via Chrome browser uses too much processing power for my liking.  Hope more apps are released soon so that other video sites (i.e. Amazon Instant) work using Chromecast.
author: Haipei Chang

review: I got the Google Chrome expecting a feature rich device for turning my older flat creek into a smart TV.  It does that with certain apps and within google chrome but is very limited when running off an ipad.The device sets up easily, and quickly connected to the wifi network.  I was able to sync with my mac and cast within a few minutes.  When casting the tv responds quickly and graphics scale well. I was expecting more ipad apps enabled but suspect that will grow over time.My primary goal was to push espn3 to my TV and it does that well from my Mac but will not from my ipad which has limited my use to my office.
